complaint.description: I have sent an e-mail to Vodacom on their web page 02 August 2022 to complain about a scam that is going about that people have won a Red Kia automatic and a R25000.00 cash as a prize in the Vodacom unlock you summer competition. No one from Vodacom has bothered to contact me to date. I then tried again and I used their on line robot. I had a reply to wait for an agent to assist., after 28 mins of waiting I logged out. This shows that Vodacom do not care for there subscribers who use pay as you go and being a pensioner and having your money stolen. So where is service delivery.
complaint.suggestion: Vodacom should improve their customer service by promptly responding to customer complaints and providing assistance in a timely manner.
